text:
Józef Grzesiak (18 February 1941 – 30 May 2020) was a Polish boxer. He was born in Popów, Greater Poland Voivodeship, Poland. He competed for Poland in the 1964 Summer Olympics held in Tokyo, Japan. He finished in third place, winning a bronze medal.
Grzesiak died of dementia-related problems in Warsaw on 30 May 2020, aged 79.
